bug.author: JingyuQian
bug.description:
Hello, thanks for this annotation tool, it's really useful!
Just curious, how do I erase all the users previously registered? I tried deleting a user in the admin panel, but received an Server error: 500. Once a user logged in, the next time he wants to log in with another account, how to switch between accounts? I don't see a button on the UI for it.
Thanks very much!
